svg:
iOS Development Frameworks Architecture
Application Layer
Native iOS Apps Swift/Objective-C Xcode
Apple Watch WatchKit WatchConnectivity
Widgets WidgetKit SwiftUI
App Clips Lightweight Experience
Extensions Share, Today Keyboard, etc.
Siri Shortcuts Intents IntentsUI
AR/VR Apps ARKit RealityKit
UI Frameworks Layer
SwiftUI (Modern) • Declarative UI • View Protocol • State Management • Combine Integration • Cross-platform • Animation
UIKit (Traditional) • Imperative UI • UIViewController • Auto Layout • Interface Builder • Storyboards • Mature & Stable
Specialized UI • GameplayKit • SpriteKit • SceneKit • Metal • PDFKit • WebKit
Application Services Layer
Networking • URLSession • Network
Data Persistence • Core Data • CloudKit
Location • Core Location • MapKit
Media • AVFoundation • Photos
Security • Keychain • CryptoKit
Health • HealthKit • ResearchKit
Machine Learning • Core ML • Vision
Notifications • UserNotifications • Push Notifications
Payments • PassKit • StoreKit
Communication • MessageUI • Contacts
Reactive • Combine • Publishers
AR/VR • ARKit • RealityKit
Core Services Layer
Foundation • Basic Data Types • Collections (Array, Dict) • String, Date, URL
Core Animation • CALayer • Animations & Transitions • GPU Acceleration
Core Graphics • 2D Drawing • PDF Generation • Image Processing
Grand Central Dispatch • Concurrency • Queue Management • Background Tasks
Core Text • Typography • Text Layout • Font Management
Kernel & Hardware Layer
Darwin Kernel • XNU (Darwin) • Mach Microkernel
Device Drivers • Hardware Abstraction • I/O Kit
Hardware • A-Series Chips • Neural Engine
Security • Secure Enclave • Code Signing
Development Tools • Xcode IDE • Swift Compiler • iOS Simulator • Instruments
<line x1="800" y1="540" x2="800" y2="560" stroke="#666"
